alert.note: Alert for Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 5:42PM CDT until September 07 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Rapides Parish in central Louisiana... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 542 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gardner, or near Alexandria International Airport, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Alexandria International Airport, Ball, Tioga, Timber Trails, Gardner, and Woodworth. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 76 and 78, and between mile markers 86 and 99. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
